title: Jordyn Woods flaunts her famous curves in plunging mini dress at The Gemini Man premiere
text:
She has been friends with the Smith family since she was a young child.

And Jordyn Woods came out Sunday night to support her 'Uncle Will' at the premiere of his new film The Gemini Man.

The 22-year-old model showed off her curvaceous figure in a plunging mini dress.

Red hot: Jordyn Woods showed off her curvaceous figure in a plunging mini dress while at the Gemini Man premiere in Los Angeles, Sunday night

The Instagram sensation showed off some skin with the plunging neckline and short skirt.

In a gold and black camouflage pattern, the deep neckline and long puff sleeves, attention was drawn to her bare chest.

She flaunted her outfit and figure from all angles in the black and gold camouflage frock.

Keeping accessories simple, Jordyn wore strappy gold stilettos and small gold hoop earrings.

Curves for days: She flaunted her outfit and figure from all angles in the black and gold camouflage frock

Shining: In a gold and black camouflage pattern, the deep neckline and long puff sleeves, attention was drawn to her bare chest

Gold: Keeping accessories simple, Jordyn wore strappy gold stilettos and small gold hoop earrings

Before the event she shared at-home snaps to her Instagram of her makeup and outfit.

The SECNDNTURE founder looked glamorous with gold eyeshadow and a glossy nude lip.

Last month she commemorated Will Smith's birthday with a throwback back photo with the star when she was just a child.

In previous years she has said 'Happy birthday to a man who has greatly impacted my life. Love you uncle willy.'

But first: Before the event she shared at-home snaps to her Instagram of her makeup and outfit

Glam: The SECNDNTURE founder looked glamorous with gold eyeshadow and a glossy nude lip

Will and his wife Jada's support for Jordyn was clear earlier this year when she got swept into a national cheating scandal that ended her friendship with now ex-BFF Kylie Jenner.

Jordyn was spotted at a party kissing Khloe Kardashian's baby daddy Tristan Thompson.

Jada brought Jordyn onto her show Red Table Talk to share her side of the story.

Man of the night: Jordyn as been friends with Will Smith and his family since she was a child, at they were a big support during her Tristan Thompson cheating scandal
description: Jordyn Woods came out Sunday night to support her 'Uncle Will' at the premiere of his new film The Gemini Man. The 22-year-old model showed off her curvaceous figure in a plunging mini dress.
